Articles.Content:
whackjob building an slv for the infinity, since he said he would if it was completed.

And thus the universe was sucked dry to create a computer to simulate the ship.

Even the unsc is sane enough to build infinity class warships in space. As a forerunner ghost, I have the authorization to build it then run it on Cortana and John to make her go rampant. (I am not called Faber. Not at all.)

Even the unsc is sane enough to build infinity class warships in space. As a forerunner ghost, I have the authorization to build it then run it on Cortana and John to make her go rampant. (I am not called Faber. Not at all.)

Speak English.
How much does DCSV Trident weigh?

Knowing the density of her ships,I would say in the area of 70-80 tons.

While this one is shaping to be over 200.
Those missiles are a bit overkill. I have missiles maybe half the size of those that can kill quite a lot.
By missiles you mean 18 SRB power MAC rounds?

By missiles you mean 18 SRB power MAC rounds?

If it has SRBs propelling it, it's not a MAC cannon. A MAC cannon, or, as I like to call it, a railgun, is an electromagnet capable of accelerating objects to high speed.
Power=level of damage(There are no MACs either though)
Sorry for the grammar. I can only type on my smartphone for now.

Sorry for the grammar. I can only type on my smartphone for now.

Not your grammar. Your Halo references. It's like talking to a Naruto fan. xD

@Falling: The Trident-class weighs 84.1t.

Edited March 13, 2014 by daemonCaptrix
Be glad you haven't met a korra fan. It isn't a normal conversation.

I need to do a railgun ship. Making it is the hard part

edit: it is now 12:14am in Alabama and I just got an idea on how to make a railgun ship.

First though I need ammo designs. Any body got some they can share?

Edited March 13, 2014 by War Eagle 1

-AvronMullican vs daeCorp- (Round 2)

daeCorp Fleet:

1x Trident-Class Cannon Battlecruiser

-DCSV Trident

2x Naiad-Class Missile Corvette

-DCSV Naiad

-DCSV Rusalka

3x Osuzumebachi Defence Fighter

-Silver Squadron

Persistence: https://www./?ysc7k9z3ysrp72h
I just updated the destroyer with shroud armor. Dual armor.
Ok so I have my ship (a Valiant Class Destroyers) to use as a rail gun ship. However accuracy is something I need to work on.

I apologize for not making my move yet, I have been pretty swamped with school work. I will make my move ASAP, and get back to you guys soon.

(Damn correspondence course. Wait Six weeks before sending me a username and password, which then doesnt work. Then it takes another week to get me a working one. So now I am almost six weeks behind on work.)
We've brought war to the ground and through the ether, yet the skies remain untouched. When are we going to fix this?
Time to fix that with the sabre. Prepare for atmospheric warfare.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n0i36s3QpIg


Persistent:https://www.dropbox.com/s/ber5cje885yg57c/persistent.sfs
Sorry it took so long.

Silver Leader attacked V-2

V-2's control module just sort of... fell off... Well that's one ship down. ._.

Persistent: https://www./?ysc7k9z3ysrp72h

Edited March 14, 2014 by daemonCaptrix

Time to fix that with the sabre. Prepare for atmospheric warfare.

*Sabres

The SABRE? How about the Turbo-Nuke?

A modified F-35 outfitted for VTOL and SSTO with superimposed two TurboJet engines and one LV-N.
So I came up with a concept for a new kind of carrier-esque ship, should get finished over the weekend and be ready for a test fight soon if anyone would be willing
All of our sabres have very similar capabilities. Both are even vtol.
